text: @NYGovCuomo @LawlessBorders Be Informed About Face Masks! For heaven sakes don’t take advice from the man who ordered COVID19 patients into nursing homes, even though he now denies it. The truth was conveniently removed from website. https://t.co/2qE6rlzH7u
